item.description: Have questions? Find answers here! Need assistance with LunaVPN setup on your device?

item.title: How to setup WireGuard connection on Android
item.description: Here are the steps you will go through: Credentials and Locations Install WireGuard on Android Download Configuration File Load Configuration File Credentials and Locations For any LunaVPN provisioned WireGuard connection, you will need to have a Configuration File downloaded to your mobile device, or be able to scan a QR Code from a computer browser for the VPN Server.

item.title: How to setup WireGuard connection on iOS
item.description: Here are the steps you will go through: Credentials and Locations Install WireGuard on iOS Download Configuration File Load Configuration File Credentials and Locations For any LunaVPN provisioned WireGuard connection, you will need to have a Configuration File downloaded to your mobile device, or be able to scan a QR Code from a computer browser for the VPN Server.

item.title: How to setup WireGuard connection on macOS

item.title: What Is A VPN?
item.description: A VPN or virutal private network, is a secure tunnel between your device and the internet, designed to shield you from prying eyes, interference, and censorship.
